section.p: Prerio Perio Dental Obseravation during treatment planning.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] periodontalInformation with data type String
Information for the periodontal examination used in by the Discus program.

Contains exactly one [1..1] perioNullData with data type String
Represents the Discus dental hex code for perio nulls to differentiate between a '0'.

Contains exactly one [1..1] periodontalInformation with data type String
Information for the periodontal examination used in by the Discus program.

Contains exactly one [1..1] perioNullData with data type String
Represents the Discus dental hex code for perio nulls to differentiate between a '0'.
